text: Shehu Idris (20 February 1936 â€“ 20 September 2020) was a Nigerian royal. He was the 18th Fulani Emir of Zazzau and the Chairman of Zazzau Emirate Council and Kaduna State Emirate Council from 1975 until his death. He became emir on 08 February 1975 following the death of Alhaji Muhammadu Aminu, the 17th Emir of Zazzau. He was born in Zaria, Nigeria. == Biography == On 10 January 2015 he celebrated his 40 years coronation anniversary, and 8 February 2020, he celebrated his 45 years coronation anniversary. == Death == Idris died 20 September 2020 at the age of 84 at a military hospital in Zaria. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Kaduna State Category:Nigerian royalty
title: Shehu Idris
